Installation GuideÂ¶

  1. Start with installing Fuel Master node [1].

  2. Install Fuel Plugin Builder on Fuel Master node [2].

  3. Install Git on Fuel Master node:

    [root@fuel ~]# yum install git -y

  4. Clone the plugin from Github [3].

    [root@fuel ~]# git clone http://github.com/openstack/fuel-plugin-dbaas-trove.git -b stable/8.0

  5. Build the plugin:

    [root@fuel ~]# cd fuel-plugin-dbaas-trove
[root@fuel ~]# fpb --build .

  6. Install the plugin:

    [root@fuel ~]# fuel plugins --install fuel-plugin-dbaas-trove-1.0-1.0.3-1.noarch.rpm

  7. Verify that the plugin is installed correctly:

    [root@nailgun ~]# fuel plugins
id | name                    | version | package_version
---|-------------------------|---------|----------------
1  | fuel-plugin-dbaas-trove | 1.0.3  | 4.0.0
[1]https://docs.mirantis.com/openstack/fuel/fuel-8.0/fuel-install-guide.html#introduction-to-fuel-installation
[2]https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Fuel/Plugins#install_latest
[3]http://github.com/openstack/fuel-plugin-dbaas-trove.git
